Lefort is proud to announce the successful commissioning of a first Lidex 1300T at the Taiwanese company, Feng Hsin Steel. 

Proof of the growing interest in Lefort machines from steelmakers, this installation also demonstrates the productivity and robustness necessary for companies wishing to process all kinds of scrap metal at high efficiency. 

A great project smoothly conducted by our teams and our local partners. Congratulations!

LEFORT TRAX 1000

Time for innovation.  the Lefort Trax 1000 will take over the work of the Lefort 900 mobile.
USA üá∫üá∏
Australia üá¶üá∫

A new LEFORT Koloss 1000 TS has joined the ranks at Dalton Metal Recycling

A new Koloss, for a brand new yard for the Dalton Group in Central/Western Glasgow. This yard is brand new and designed to give the best layout for Metal Recycling. The electrically powered (4x110kW) giant of a shear is now in place and ready to further enhance the processing capability of the Dalton Group. The machine is extremely quick, due to the 4 large electric motors and three valve blocks, making it a very strong and productive machine üí™üèΩ

‚Äî

‚öôÔ∏è 1000T cutting force, Ts box (wraparound), 180T baling ram, 4 x 110 kW electric motors, 8.0m box length, lid force each lid 400T, hold down 200T, loading hopper, window crosshead, platform & cabin, automatic greasing.

Venerd√¨ abbiamo avuto  l‚Äôultimo di 3 incontri con i ragazzi delle scuole secondarie di primo grado di Mozzecane e Nogarole Rocca. I ragazzi, divisi a gruppi, hanno visitato l‚Äôofficina e gli uffici della ditta dove sono state spiegate loro le varie figure professionali. Il tutto nell‚Äôottica della scelta della corretta scuola secondaria di secondo grado. I ragazzi, accompagnati dai professori, hanno mostrato interesse e fatto domande. Speriamo di essere stati d‚Äôaiuto nella scelta del loro percorso di studi che li preparer√† alla vita lavorativa. In bocca al lupo ragazzi!

The SENNEBOGEN 360 G takes telehandler performance to a whole new level: With its robust steel construction it is built for demanding multi-shift operations in industrial applications and more. üè≠

üí™ The best of both worlds: combining the power and Z-kinematics of a wheel loader with the agility of a telehandler. The new addition to our portfolio boosts with even faster work cycles and higher efficiency.  
üîù Heavy lifter with a 6 t load capacity and an 8.5 m stacking height. 
üë∑ Newly redesigned Multicab for maximum operator benefits: The cab can be raised to 4.25 m view height, providing an optimal view of trucks, containers, and the entire jobsite. 
üîáNoise & vibration protection, ergonomic controls, and an intuitive touch display ensure a fatigue-free and highly efficient workspace.
üîÑ Versatile & customizable: Choose from a wide range of attachments, equipment options, and tire variants to tailor the 360 G to your needs.

üì¢ Learn more in the press release:
‚û°Ô∏è https://bit.ly/4h2hNBn

üìç Join us at bauma Munich in April 2025 to see the 360 G at our booth!

The SENNEBOGEN 830 has been upgraded to the newest G-Series machine generation! The powerful 830 G material handler delivers enhanced efficiency, performance, and operator comfort. 

üí™ Up to 17 m reach and a 38 t operating weight make the 830 G ideal for demanding scrap handling, recycling, timber, and port applications.
‚úÖ With its modular design, and various undercarriage and attachment options, SENNEBOGEN can provide you with the ideal solution for your jobsite.
üçÉ Optimized for low fuel consumption, reduced emissions, and HVO capability.
üë∑ New Maxcab Comfort Cab: Designed for operator comfort, featuring the best view, a vibration-resistant workspace, ergonomic climate-controlled seating, and active noise cancellation.
üïπÔ∏è With SENcon Control System: The revolutionary new SENcon provides intuitive operation, individual driver profiles, real-time machine insights, remote diagnostics, and over-the-air updates.

Learn more about the 830 G in the press release: 
‚û°Ô∏è https://bit.ly/4b42mac

üìç Join us at Bauma 2025 in Munich in April to see the 830 G at our booth!

Introducing our new SENcon control system: Smart, more intuitive, future-ready! Designed for operators, fleet managers, and service technicians, SENcon ensures maximum efficiency, safety, and ease of use with a range of powerful features:

üïπÔ∏è Customizable Driver Profiles: Adjust joystick settings and machine parameters for personalized comfort and precision.
üí° Intelligent Assistance Systems: Features like the Virtual Wall and load weighing increase accuracy and safety.
üìä Real-time Machine Monitoring: Get instant insights into machine performance and live diagnostics for optimal efficiency.
üîß Remote Service Support: Diagnose issues remotely, minimize downtime, and ensure fast, targeted maintenance.
üîÑ Wireless Over-the-air Software Updates: Always up to date, no on-site visits needed.
‚úÖ Seamless Fleet Integration: Connect with SENtrack telematics system to optimize performance, maintenance, and energy efficiency.

Learn more in the press release: ‚û°Ô∏è https://bit.ly/3CQFGh9

üîú Stay tuned for the first SENNEBOGEN machines featuring the new SENcon! We will soon introduce the new machines for bauma 2025:
https://bauma.sennebogen.com/

Sustainable and Cost-Efficient SENNEBOGEN Machine Transport via Water Route üåç‚öì

Our recent shipment of eight large SENNEBOGEN machines from Straubing to South Carolina via eco-friendly waterway marks another step toward sustainable logistics at SENNEBOGEN. üçÉ

A total of 700 tons of machinery was loaded onto barges at the port of Straubing. üö¢ Among them were the powerful SENNEBOGEN 855 and 870 material handlers, weighing between 70 and 105 tons. The complex loading process involved precise tandem lifts, performed with a SENNEBOGEN 5500 E Crawler Crane, working in tandem with another crane.

The machines are now traveling via inland and ocean vessels to their final destination in Charleston, South Carolina. üá∫üá∏ This water route cuts CO‚ÇÇ emissions by 75%, saving 49 tons compared to road transport. ‚úÖ

Restoration of historic SENNEBOGEN machines - former apprentice project with a success story üîß
Our employees Andreas and Alois started their career at SENNEBOGEN with an extraordinary project: the restoration of historical machines for the opening of the Erich Sennebogen Museum in 2014. ‚ú® 
One of these machines was a SENNEBOGEN S 802 rope excavator, in production between 1958 and 1960. After so many decades, the wear and tear of time had taken a heavy toll on the machine, which had to be dismantled and painstakingly restored. Alongside other historical models, all restored to their former glory, it is a witness to the development of mechanical engineering in our company's history. üëè
Ten years after the museum opened, Andreas and Alois are still part of our team and have made impressive careers since then. üöÄ
üí°Read more here: ‚û°Ô∏è https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

Restaurierung historischer SENNEBOGEN Maschinen - ehemaliges Azubiprojekt mit Erfolgsgeschichte üîß
Unsere Mitarbeiter Andreas und Alois starteten ihre Karriere bei SENNEBOGEN mit einem au√üergew√∂hnlichen Projekt: der Restaurierung historischer Maschinen zur Er√∂ffnung des Erich Sennebogen Museums um 2014. ‚ú® 
Eine dieser Maschinen war ein SENNEBOGEN S 802 Seilbagger, in Produktion zwischen 1958 und 1960. Nach so vielen Jahrzehnten hatte der Zahn der Zeit stark an der Maschine genagt, welche  zerlegt und in m√ºhevoller Detailarbeit restauriert werden musste. Im Museum in Straubing zeugt sie seit der Aufbereitung in neuer Pracht neben anderen historischen Modellen von der Entwicklung des Maschinenbaus in der Unternehmensgeschichte. üëè
Auch Andreas und Alois sind zehn Jahre nach Museumser√∂ffnung immer noch Teil unseres Teams und haben seitdem beeindruckende Karrieren gemacht. üöÄ
